name: Santa Crunch
description:
Ho! Ho!! Ho!!!

It's Christmas season. Help Santa as he overcomes obstacles and dangerous enemies in order to get presents. Hop through energizing levels and discover breathtaking places.

Be agile... be fast... and help Santa discover his presents.. It's covered up in a run of amazingly well-designed levels, and he's decided to discover it all!

NOTE: Santa Crunch is completely free to play, but there may be a few in-game items that you simply can buy, that's if you choose to. This game works without an internet or wifi connection.

Amazing features:
+ 2 amazing characters
+ Astounding in-game graphics.
+ 14 distinctive themes
+ 3 challenging enemies
+ Regular Updates

Need technical support? Want to send us suggestions? Just contact us at any time at photonxgames@gmail.com
